architectural_notes: Case-loading logic is implemented in frontend hooks (e.g., hooks/useQueries.ts or hooks/useBackendConnection.ts) which call backend queries.
known_issues: Live app web page shows 'Server Cases Loading Failed' when loading cases; likely caused by frontend still calling deprecated backend query getAllSurgeryCases from case-loading hooks.

new_feature_requests.summary: Audit all frontend case-loading hooks and flows to ensure there are zero runtime call paths that invoke the deprecated backend method `getAllSurgeryCases()`, and update any remaining references to use the paginated API `getSurgeryCases(start, limit)` (directly or via existing pagination helpers).
Ensure the deployed frontend is using fresh generated backend bindings and is redeployed so that Live cannot call removed legacy APIs.
